name: VRain
description:
This is the VR truck made in a Virtual Reality world, ironic isn't it?

Use the arrow keys to walk around, space bar to jump, and shift to run.

Pick up items by looking at the omni treadmill + type "E". Rotate them around by typing "R" and drop them again by typing "E".

Opening and closing the truck will happen automatically when walking towards the truck, but it can also be done manually by typing  "O" (open) and "C" (close).
